long_description: The REI Small Go Box cooler keeps food fresh and organized while you make the morning commute or head out for a hike. Go Boxes are designed to pack neatly inside a backpack, tote or bicycle panniers so you can stay organized while on the go. Closed-cell foam provides efficient insulation to keep food and beverages cool for hours. Heavy-duty PEVA liner is waterproof and PVC-free; liner wipes clean quickly and easily. Zippered exterior pocket holds utensils and napkins. Webbing handle lets you easily transport the Go Box.
short_description: The REI Small Go Box cooler keeps food fresh and organized while you make the morning commute or head out for a hike.
